result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marco A Clayton

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Marco A Clayton in court with attorney Cameron Weitzner.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Dismissed and Read-in to: 15CM1095.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 31, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Marco A Clayton in court with attorney Cameron Weitzner.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Weitzner advises the Court the Defendant has completed treatment but does not have written documentation to provide to the Court at this time.   Defendant's appearance may be waived at the next hearing if Attorney Weitzner obtains the necessary documentation.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 31, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 24, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 22, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Marco A Clayton in court with attorney Cameron Weitzner.  Kevin Michael Osborne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Defendant is enrolled in treatment and has completed 3 of the 15 sessions.  There is an offer to amend with completion of treatment.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 22, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Donavin P Hemphill in court, in custody, with attorney Jorge R Fragoso.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Court calls the case to address the motion to stay the sentence pending appeal.  Attorney Fragoso addressees the Court.  The Court denies the motion for reasons stated on the record.

Defendant Marco A Clayton in court, in custody, with attorney Cameron Weitzner.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  The Court sets bail on 15CM1095.  There is an offer to amend with the completion of counseling.  Hearing scheduled for April 4, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing.
Waukesha County Pretrial Screening Services Report by Wisconsin Community Services filed.

Defendant Marco A Clayton in court, in custody.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court advises of right to an attorney.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for January 29, 2016 at 08:30 am.
